attributes.action: get his publically accessible email working again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM's public email via his website has been unavailable since the 23rd of June 2008. I feel that this is an excessive time for the PM's email to be offline.

rejection.details:
You can write to the PM at the following address:

10 Downing Street,
London,
SW1A 2AA
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
